title: 1.8.0: Hiero crashing in batch mode
body:
Running it in batch mode from `desktop/build.gradle` like this:

```
task fonts(type: JavaExec) {
  classpath = sourceSets.main.runtimeClasspath
  main = "com.badlogic.gdx.tools.hiero.Hiero"
  args = ["--batch", "--input", "../fonts/azoft-sans.hiero", "--output", "android/assets/azoft-sans.fnt"]
}
```

Stack trace:


The fix should be easy enough. I'll send a PR.
